ValidationRule.description: This Validation prevent users from changing Room type, Account and Type after insert
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR(AND( ISCHANGED( Room_Type__c ), NOT ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE(Room_Type__c))),AND( ISCHANGED( Account__c ), NOT ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE(Account__c ))),AND( ISCHANGED( Type ), NOT ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE( Type ))))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Can not change Room Type or Account or Type of a Campaign once created
